title: The Draymond Green Show - Steph's (Almost) Record, Kenneth Walker's Snub, and a Metta World Peace Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Steph's (Almost) Record, Kenneth Walker's Snub, and a Metta World Peace Interview
description:
In the fourth episode of The Draymond Green Show, Draymond explains why the way Steph Curry is breaking Ray Allen’s three point record is more impressive than the record itself before giving his thoughts on Kenneth Walker III being snubbed as a Heisman finalist. Then he welcomes Metta World Peace to discuss his regrets from his time as an Indiana Pacer, the ‘Malice at the Palace’, his mental health journey, and much more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
